segments.text: I see this cozy kitchen with sunlight streaming in from the window.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: There's a woman at the sink, carefully drying a plate with a towel.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: She looks so focused on her task, like it's the most important thing right now.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: But wait, the sink is overflowing, water pouring out everywhere.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: She's standing right in the puddle and doesn't even notice.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Over on the left, there's a boy climbing up on a little stool to reach the cookie jar.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The stool looks wobbly, like it might tip any second.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: His sister is down below, reaching up with her hand out, waiting for a cookie.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: They seem so sneaky, trying to get treats without mom knowing.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The garden outside looks peaceful, all neat bushes and a path.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's funny how everything seems normal from the window, but inside it's chaos waiting to happen.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I hope the boy doesn't fall and spill those cookies everywhere.
segments.speaker: PAR
